requirements.description: The system must support end-to-end encryption for private chats.
The system must scale to 10,000+ concurrent users.
The system must integrate with Slack, Gmail, and Notion.
The system must support ISO 27001-2022 compliance.
The system must implement a four-layer memory architecture: Working Context, Episodic Memory, Semantic Memory, and Procedural Memory.

children.description: Define the Working Context Memory Layer.
acceptance_criteria: A data model is defined for the Working Context, including fields for: Context ID, Timestamp, Associated Entities, Priority, and Status.
An API endpoint (POST /context) is created to create new Working Context entries.
An API endpoint (GET /context/{context_id}) is created to retrieve a specific Working Context entry.
An API endpoint (PUT /context/{context_id}) is created to update an existing Working Context entry.
An API endpoint (DELETE /context/{context_id}) is created to delete a Working Context entry.
The UI displays a form for creating and editing Working Context entries, including validation for required fields.
The system logs all Working Context creation, update, and deletion events with relevant details.
